response.overview: The Beat Bugs "Season 1, Volume 2 - Come Together" On June 30 Republic will be releasing on DVD the complete first season of the acclaimed Netflix animated kids series Beat Bugs. Beat Bugs was created by Josh Wakely, following a ground breaking deal with Sony/ATV Music Publishing, and is produced by his Grace: A Storytelling Company in conjunction with Beyond Screen Production and Thunderbird. Wakely personally selected each of the songs for integration into the series episodes and was involved in the musics production, arranging and mixing.
response.title: Beat Bugs - Come Together
